name: Pokémon: Golden Emerald
storyline: You're a kid that was chosen by the Prof. Oak to become a great trainer ! Choose your starter, and leave the town to go and explore the world ! On your way, you'll meet the Rocket Team, who's been suspected to work with the Magma and Aqua Team... What do they want ? What is their goal ? Are the Ancients Pokemon involved...?
summary: A Pokémon Fangame made on RPG Maker XP, using the Pokémon Script Project : Evolved starter kit. Explore a brand new region and battle trainers with your Pokémon ! Resolve puzzles, save people, obtain all 8 badges, beat the Elite 4, and more !
